name: Cross Pixels
description: Cross Pixels is a collection of Picross puzzles. Train your logic thinking and reveal the hidden picture.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-4720HQ 2,6GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX960M Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 30 MB available space Additional Notes: Monitor resultion of 1920x1080 recomended for the moment
